name: Food Seeker
description:
Have you ever hunted a dragon spaghetti? Climbed a mountain of pancake? Or been chased by a horde of rabid eggs?

Well, Food Seeker invites you to embark on this tasty adventure!

Discover the culinary island you arrived on, and travel through this universe by solving various puzzles, while meeting the little creatures that inhabit this island filled with mystery.

Food Seeker is a solo PC metroidvania as a student project, and tackles the topic of food. The player embodies a huntress named Marysette sent on a mission by her grandfather. She must hunt rare creatures to create exceptional recipes to restore the image of the family restaurant. Your goal is to hunt rare creatures to create exceptional recipes in order to restore the image of the restaurant passed on to you by your grandfather.

 

Explore

Visit each region of the island, to discover all its secrets, and to learn more about the flora and fauna.

  Discover

Discover the culinary island you arrived on, and travel through this universe by solving various puzzles, while meeting the little creatures that inhabit this island filled with mystery.

    Face powerful enemies

Fight against powerful creatures high up the food chain and defeat them to reap valuable rewards.

 

Progress !

As your adventure progresses, look for new equipment and skills to become stronger and thus gain access to whole new regions of the island.

  Hunt ... or flee

The job of harvester is sometimes very dangerous, and you will not always be the hunter ... Some creatures will be much stronger than Marysette, so you will have to be smarter than them, or else turn back.

If you get there.

Hoping you will enjoy your (little) adventure!

 

The team :   

Quentin HUBERT - Game Designer / Level Designer / Programmer / Manager

  

Tiffany PORTA - Artist 2D / UI Artist / Character Animator

  

Elodie JORNAT - Environment Artist

  

Rodolphe JAMIN-LAMOUR - UI Artist

    

Joachim SAILLY - Sound Designer / Composer
